howItWorks.subtitle: Understand how to make the most of your English learning journey

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Our system uses spaced repetition techniques to optimize your learning. Cards appear at the ideal moments to maximize retention.

levels.title: Progressive Levels
levels.description: Start at Beginner level and gradually advance to Elementary, Intermediate, and Advanced. Each level unlocks after completing the previous one.

step1.title: Choose a Lesson
step1.description: On the dashboard, click on a Beginner level lesson to start. Lessons are unlocked sequentially.

step2.title: Practice the Cards
step2.description: See the question on the front of the card, think of the answer, and click to reveal. Rate your difficulty using the buttons: Again, Hard, Good, Easy.

step3.title: Complete the Lesson
step3.description: After practicing all cards in the lesson, it will be marked as completed and cards will enter the review system.

difficultyButtons.title: Dynamic Difficulty Buttons
difficultyButtons.description: The buttons dynamically show when the card will appear again, based on the spaced repetition algorithm. Intervals change according to your progress!

again.title: Again
again.description: Didn't know the answer. Appears in less than 10 minutes - always in minutes to relearn.

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: Knew it, but it was difficult. First time: less than 15 minutes, then: N days based on progress.

good.title: Good
good.description: Knew it well. First time: 1 day, second: 4 days, then: N days based on ease factor.

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: Very easy. First time: 2 days, then: N days with longer interval than Good.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our system uses an intelligent spaced repetition algorithm to calculate review intervals. Each card has an ease factor that increases or decreases based on your performance. Intervals are dynamic and shown on the buttons!
